name: Fathom Varadero Mask with Dry Snorkel
description: Dive and return to the surface without taking in water. This quality mask and snorkel combo lets you venture deep below the surface. It's easy to equalize and offers a great field of view. Any water that does enter can be purged through the mouthpiece valve.Low volume mask is easy to equalize, allowing you to dive with less effort.Viewport is close to your face for optimal visibility.Side panels further extend your field of view.Soft silicone skirt provides a secure and comfortable seal.Adjustable silicone headband.Dry snorkel lets you dive and resurface without taking in water.Silicone connector conforms to your face, reducing jaw fatigue.Comfortable silicone mouthpiece.
